thread.title: Paul Glover Joins G2 Insurance Services as Assistant Vice President and Producer

author: cnbc.com
title: Paul Glover Joins G2 Insurance Services as Assistant Vice President and Producer
text:
SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Paul Glover joins G2 Insurance Services as Assistant Vice President and Producer. Paul plans to expand the company’s middle market property and casualty practice. He will focus on manufacturers, real estate owners, financial institutions, wholesalers, schools, and museums with 100 to 1,000 employees.
“Paul is a great addition to our team,” said Mark Ruggles, CEO. “His background in balancing profitability and volume through strategic growth initiatives for a Dow 30 property and casualty insurance carrier will add tremendous value and perspective to our clients. He has expertise structuring all the core property and casualty products in addition to complex risk treatment, assessment, and financing solutions.”
Prior to joining G2 Insurance Services, Paul spent nine years in positions of increasing responsibility with The Travelers Companies (NYSE: TRV). He most recently served as a Managing Account Executive where he managed a team of underwriters and a book of complex middle market business.
Paul earned his BA from Colgate University and his MBA from the University of California, Berkeley, Haas School of Business. He also holds the Chartered Property Casualty Underwriter (CPCU) and Associate in Risk Management (ARM) designations from The American Institute for Chartered Property Casualty Underwriters.
“I am thrilled to join the G2 team,” said Paul. “G2’s creative solutions, private ownership, and their focus on long-term client relationships are a competitive advantage in the marketplace. That combination is very rare these days. I am confident my clients will enjoy a truly unique experience with G2.”
Paul is located in G2 Insurance Services’ San Francisco office. He can be reached at 415-426-6660 and pglover@G2insurance.com .
About G2 Insurance Services
Founded in 2012 and located in San Francisco, G2 Insurance Services is an independent, full-service property, casualty and employee benefits insurance brokerage firm focused on the risk management needs of for-profit companies, non-profit organizations and high-net-worth individuals. More information can be found at www.G2insurance.com .
